name: Christopher Soltis
title: Software Engineer
content: Austin has rapidly proven himself to be an exceptional software developer showing a remarkable aptitude for quickly mastering new challenges and an inventive approach to problem-solving. His ability to work collaboratively and offer support to teammates not only highlights his technical skills but also underscores his value as a phenomenal team player. Austin's dedication and passion for learning makes him a standout developer who I am confident will make significant contributions to the tech industry.

name: Brandon Etter
title: Full Stack Developer
content: I had the pleasure of working alongside Austin for several projects. He was always incredibly reliable and professional. Austin was always very fun to work with and I wouldn't hesitate to work alongside him again in any capacity.

name: Adrian Hajdin
title: Founder & CEO at JS Mastery
content: I have had the pleasure of working with Austin as a Software Developer and can confidently say that he is a valuable asset to any team. He is highly skilled in ReactJS, NextJS, Javascript, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Redux, and GitHub, and consistently delivers high-quality code.
